comments:
I created a new launch config, switched to the plugins tab.  I deselected all workspace plugins, then checked the target twice to select all target plugins.

Then I selected one plugin from my workspace, unchecked the automatically add new plugins, and clickec validate plugins.  It gave me an error in the error log.

java.fullversion=J2RE 1.5.0 IBM J9 2.3 Linux x86-32 j9vmxi3223-20060919 (JIT enabled)

I was curious, are you able to reproduce this consistently?  I was looking over the code and the exception, and it the widget that seems to be disposed is the Composite of the PluginsTab.  I am not really sure how that would happen.  Other than this exception, did everything behave correctly?  Was this the only error in the error log?

Created an attachment (id=55903)
error log for dispose

There was just that one error and a CVS LF warning log.

PW
Fixed.  When getting the Shell to open the results of the validation, we check to see if the control is disposed.  If it is, we then get the Shell of the workbench just to be safe.
